original_text: But we, brethren, being taken from you for a short time in presence, not in heart, endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리가 잠시 너희를 떠난 것은 얼굴이요 마음은 아니니 너희 얼굴 보기를 열정으로 더욱 힘썼노라

sentences.original_text: being taken from you for a short time in presence
endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face
sentences.korean_translation: 더욱 힘써 여러분의 얼굴을 보고자 하였습니다
